o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_AttributeSelector
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript:
Function %Get%(obj) 'Initialize the return value to an empty string. %Get% = ""
' Get the attribute. Dim objAttribute : Set objAttribute = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Attribute")
' If the child attribute is not empty, return the FQ name. If Not(objAttribute Is Nothing) Then %Get% = objAttribute.DisplayName End If End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:SetMethodScript:
Sub %Set%(obj, value) ' Implement your setter method on <obj> here ' using <value> as you wish
End Sub
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: Attribute (MDDE)
